component.summary: pastel is a command-line tool to generate, analyze, convert and manipulate colors

description.p: pastel is a command-line tool to generate, analyze, convert and manipulate colors. It supports many different color formats and color spaces like RGB (sRGB), HSL, CIELAB, CIELCh as well as ANSI 8-bit and 24-bit representations.
